item.title: Droid Fortunes: An Experiment in Android Widgets
item.description: Background I have it set up on my OSX machine to give me a random fortune when I log into the shell. I thought it would be a good idea to port this to Android in the form of a widget and Droid Fortunes was born! So a little more background on the the ‘fortune’ command for those who do not know. The program itself is simple enough - display a random message stored in a database.
